mapper.select: SELECT order1.plan_id,order1.user_pay_amount,order1.total_amount,order2.order_status,order1.create_time,order1.user_id FROM tb_recharge_order AS order1 JOIN tb_order_status AS order2 ON order1.order_id = order2.order_id WHERE order1.order_id = #{orderId}

SELECT order1.order_id,order2.order_status,order1.user_pay_amount,order1.create_time FROM tb_recharge_order AS order1 JOIN tb_order_status AS order2 ON order1.order_id = order2.order_id WHERE order1.user_id = #{userId} AND order1.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY order1.create_time DESC
